data.title: Enterprise Productivity
data.text:
Great teams are built on great communication

New capabilities now in Office 365, combined with the just-released Office 2016 apps, means your company has access to the most comprehensive, most secure cloud productivity and communication Office 365 offering ever.

Built for teams and networks

Connect your workforce with great communication

Connect your teams in real time with the Skype experiences they love, from the Office applications they use every day. Now, simplify your infrastructure with one platform in Office 365 for calling, conferencing, video, and, sharing.

People-centric security

Advanced security and compliance tools

With Office 365, Microsoft takes security and compliance to the next level. Now you have even more control over your data security and compliance with built-in privacy, transparency, and refined user controls. It’s easy to see why this is the most secure Office. Ever.

Personal and organizational insights

Let your data tell its story

Easy-to-use live data monitoring and in-depth personal and organizational analysis tools let you discover new stories in your data with even more interactive reports, simpler dashboards, and compelling data visualizations.

Maximize sales productivity

Stay focused. Win faster. Build trust.

In a world where buying decisions are made before you can even engage, salespeople must adapt. A sales solution needs to help salespeople adapt easily so they can sell effectively in this new world and become trusted advisors. The combination of Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online, Office 365, and Power BI drives sales productivity by making teams highly connected and collaborative.

All new Office 365

See how the new Office 365 capabilities come to life – connecting teams and telling compelling data stories in the most secure Office ever.

Office 365 is Secure – Trusted Cloud Security

We respect your privacy. It’s your data, and we protect it. Microsoft was the first cloud computing platform to conform to ISO/IEC 27018, which prohibits use of personal data for advertising or marketing. Learn why Office 365 is the best, most trusted productivity cloud for your business in the Ovum analyst report on Office 365 Trust, Security, and Compliance.

Secured information and data

Office 365 enables you to keep your data secure and protected both in transit and at rest. Access control technology provides layers of protection, including multiple levels of approval and just-in-time access with limited and time-bound authorization. We’ve ensured that you have control over your data. Read how Customer Lockbox helps keep your information safe.

Protect users and their devices

How do you protect users from mistakes like sending sensitive information to the wrong party? Or defend them from threats they aren’t aware of—like malicious links or unsafe attachments? Office 365 people-centric security—including data loss prevention and rights management—helps ensure that your sensitive information is getting to the right place, while advanced threat protection guards against hidden and sophisticated email threats.

Personal and organizational insights

Easy-to-use live data monitoring and in-depth personal and organizational analysis tools let you discover new stories in your data with even more interactive reports, simpler dashboards, and compelling data visualizations.

Bring your data story to life

Monitor and analyze a broad range of live data through easy-to-use dashboards, interactive reports, and compelling data visualizations with Power BI. With out-of-the-box Power BI content packs for popular services such as Salesforce, QuickBooks Online, and Marketo, you can begin visualizing your data in just minutes. And with the new Excel 2016 you can publish to Power BI, making it even easier to share data and insights.

Rich analytics for people and organizations

Use big data and behavioral analytics to help each individual and organization be more effective. Leverage insights into how you actually work to enable individuals and teams to identify areas to save time and focus on the highest value activities.
